EmailTemplate.name: Executive Briefing NY invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Executive Briefing at 230 Fifth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Executive Session: Practical Considerations for Cloud Architectures
VMTurbo is sponsoring an informal dialog about cloud in the enterprise, and we’d like to add your voice.
Thursday, February 20 5:30 PM-7:30 PM 230 Fifth Bar | 230 5th Ave @ 27th St, New York
RSVP Today <http://bit.ly/1hkhpeh>
Enterprises are adopting elements of the software defined datacenter to improve agility and contain costs as they move toward private, public, and hybrid cloud architectures.
Columbia professor Yechiam Yemini – whose expertise is in distributed systems – will be hosting a session on practical considerations for cloud architectures.
We’ll also be raffling an Xbox One and a PlayStation 4. Space is limited, so please RSVP <http://bit.ly/1hkhpeh> today.
Sincerely, VMTurbo
